item.title: Cope with Garmin && Strava limits
item.description: One upon a time there has been a pile of activitis in Garmin Connect which was not synced with Strava. It was thought it will be an easy thing to do to just syncronize them via some import/export feature. But it turned out not to be the case. A case agains automatic syncranization You can sync your Garmin Connect and Strava directly? But in such case you'll import/export all data available.
